function.name: mysqli_affected_rows
function.description: Gets the number of affected rows in a previous MySQL operation.

function.name: mysqli_autocommit
function.description: Turns on or off auto-commiting database modifications.

function.name: mysqli_close
function.description: Closes a previously opened database connection.

function.name: mysqli_commit
function.description: Commits the current transaction.

function.name: mysqli_connect_errno
function.description: Returns the error code from last connect call.

function.name: mysqli_connect_error
function.description: Returns a string description of the last connect error.

function.name: mysqli_data_seek
function.description: Adjusts the result pointer to an arbitary row in the result.

function.name: mysqli_debug
function.description: Performs debugging operations.

function.name: mysqli_disable_reads_from_master
function.description: Disable reads from master.

function.name: mysqli_disable_rpl_parse
function.description: Disable RPL parse.

function.name: mysqli_embedded_connect
function.description: Open a connection to an embedded mysql server.

function.name: mysqli_enable_reads_from_master
function.description: Enable reads from master.

function.name: mysqli_enable_rpl_parse
function.description: Enable RPL parse.

function.name: mysqli_errno
function.description: Returns the error code for the most recent function call.

function.name: mysqli_error
function.description: Returns a string description of the last error.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_array
function.description: Fetch a result row as an associative, a numeric array, or both.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_assoc
function.description: Fetch a result row as an associative array.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_field
function.description: Returns the next field in the result set.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_field_direct
function.description: Fetch meta-data for a single field.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_lengths
function.description: Returns the lengths of the columns of the current row in the result set.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_object
function.description: Returns the current row of a result set as an object.

function.name: mysqli_fetch_row
function.description: Get a result row as an enumerated array.

function.name: mysqli_field_count
function.description: Returns the number of columns for the most recent query.

function.name: mysqli_field_seek
function.description: Set result pointer to a specified field offset.

function.name: mysqli_free_result
function.description: Frees the memory associated with a result.

function.name: mysqli_get_client_info
function.description: Returns the MySQL client version as a string.

function.name: mysqli_get_client_version
function.description: Get MySQL client info.

function.name: mysqli_get_server_info
function.description: Returns the version of the MySQL server.

function.name: mysqli_get_server_version
function.description: Returns the version of the MySQL server as an integer.

function.name: mysqli_change_user
function.description: Changes the user of the specified database connection.

function.name: mysqli_character_set_name
function.description: Returns the default character set for the database connection.

function.name: mysqli_info
function.description: Retrieves information about the most recently executed query.

function.name: mysqli_init
function.description: Initializes MySQLi and returns a resource for use with mysqli_real_connect().

function.name: mysqli_insert_id
function.description: Returns the auto generated id used in the last query.

function.name: mysqli_kill
function.description: Asks the server to kill a MySQL thread.

function.name: mysqli_master_query
function.description: Enforce execution of a query on the master in a master/slave setup.

function.name: mysqli_multi_query
function.description: Performs a query on the database.

function.name: mysql_info
function.description: Get information about the most recent query.

function.name: mysql_insert_id
function.description: Get the ID generated from the previous INSERT operation.

function.name: mysqli_num_rows
function.description: Gets the number of rows in a result.

function.name: mysqli_options
function.description: Set options.

function.name: mysqli_ping
function.description: Pings a server connection, or tries to reconnect if the connection has gone down.

function.name: mysqli_query
function.description: Performs a query on the database.

function.name: mysqli_real_escape_string
function.description: Escapes special characters in a string for use in a SQL statement, taking into account the current charset of the connection.

function.name: mysqli_report
function.description: Enables or disables internal report functions.

function.name: mysqli_rpl_parse_enabled
function.description: Check if RPL parse is enabled.

function.name: mysqli_rpl_probe
function.description: RPL probe.

function.name: mysqli_rpl_query_type
function.description: Returns RPL query type.

function.name: mysqli_send_query
function.description: Send the query and return.

function.name: mysqli_server_end
function.description: Shut down the embedded server.

function.name: mysqli_server_init
function.description: Initialize embedded server.

function.name: mysqli_sqlstate
function.description: Returns the SQLSTATE error from previous MySQL operation.

function.name: mysqli_ssl_set
function.description: Used for establishing secure connections using SSL.

function.name: mysqli_stat
function.description: Gets the current system status.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_bind_param
function.description: Binds variables to a prepared statement as parameters.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_bind_result
function.description: Binds variables to a prepared statement for result storage.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_close
function.description: Closes a prepared statement.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_data_seek
function.description: Seeks to an arbitray row in statement result set.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_error
function.description: Returns a string description for last statement error.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_execute
function.description: Executes a prepared Query.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_fetch
function.description: Fetch results from a prepared statement into the bound variables.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_free_result
function.description: Frees stored result memory for the given statement handle.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_param_count
function.description: Returns the number of parameter for the given statement.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_reset
function.description: Resets a prepared statement.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_result_metadata
function.description: Returns result set metadata from a prepared statement.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_send_long_data
function.description: Send data in blocks.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_sqlstate
function.description: Returns SQLSTATE error from previous statement operation.

function.name: mysqli_stmt_store_result
function.description: Transfers a result set from a prepared statement.

function.name: mysqli_store_result
function.description: Transfers a result set from the last query.

function.name: mysqli_thread_id
function.description: Returns the thread ID for the current connection.

function.name: mysqli_thread_safe
function.description: Returns whether thread safety is given or not.

function.name: mysqli_use_result
function.description: Initiate a result set retrieval.

function.name: mysqli_warning_count
function.description: Returns the number of warnings from the last query for the given link.
